amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2015, LB317, § 2. Operative date July 1, 2018. Midwest Interstate Passenger Rail Compact Cash Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Midwest Interstate Passenger Rail Compact Cash Fund is created and shall consist of money appropriated by the Legislature and gifts, grants, or bequests from any source, including federal, state, public, and private sources. The money shall be used to carry out passenger rail initiatives under the Midwest Interstate Passenger Rail Compact. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Midwest Interstate Passenger Rail Compact, see section 74-1601.
Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
